caption.p: Relationship between the dose of immunizing pre-erythrocytic and blood-stage parasites and the acquisition of immunity.

tr.td: Mosquito bite or 100 sporozoites iv: no pre-erythrocytic immunity (Figure 3A/B)
Blood-stage infection curtailed by chloroquine: partial blood-stage immunity (Figure 4)
Fulminant, self-cured blood-stage infection: blood-stage immunity (Spence et al., 2013); pre-erythrocytic immunity (Figure 6)
